kill_chicken: 2) Become friends with "Chicken" on Monster tile "Chicken"
cook_gudgeon: 1) Move to Resource tile (4, 2) "Gudgeon Fishing Spot"
2) Harvest 1 "Gudgeon" from Resource tile "Gudgeon Fishing Spot"
4) Craft 1 item "Cooked Gudgeon" on Workshop tile "Cooking"
cook_chicken: 4) Craft 1 item "Cooked Chicken" on Workshop tile "Cooking"
craft_copper_ring: 2) Harvest 48 "Copper Ore" from Resource tile "Copper Rocks"
4) Craft 6 Resource Bar "Copper" on Workshop tile "Mining"
6) Craft 1 item "Copper Ring" on Workshop tile "Jewerlycrafting"
craft_wooden_staff: 2) Harvest 4 "Ash Wood" from Resource tile "Ash Tree"
4) Unequip current item in Weapon slot
5) Craft 1 item "Wooden Staff" on Workshop tile "Weaponcrafting"
craft_wooden_shield: 2) Harvest 48 "Ash Wood" from Resource tile "Ash Tree"
4) Craft 6 Resource Plank "Ash Plank" on Workshop tile "Woodcutting"
6) Craft 1 item "Wooden Shield" on Workshop tile "Gearcrafting"
craft_full_copper_armor_set: 2) Harvest 80 "Copper Ore" from Resource tile "Copper Rocks"
4) Craft 10 Resource Bar "Copper" on Workshop tile "Mining"
6) Craft 1 item "Copper Boots" on Workshop tile "Gearcrafting"
8) Harvest 80 "Copper Ore" from Resource tile "Copper Rocks"
10) Craft 10 Resource Bar "Copper" on Workshop tile "Mining"
12) Craft 1 item "Copper Helmet" on Workshop tile "Gearcrafting"
14) Harvest 80 "Copper Ore" from Resource tile "Copper Rocks"
16) Craft 10 Resource Bar "Copper" on Workshop tile "Mining"
18) Craft 1 item "Copper Legs Armor" on Workshop tile "Gearcrafting"

22) Craft 1 Resource Bar "Copper" on Workshop tile "Mining"
